about_the_game:
Test your creativity to win! Your mission is to use objects from your inventory to guide Clampy to his destination.

Tile Blocks is a building game where you'll test your creativity by placing objects from your inventory to help Clampy reach his destination. Each object has a unique functionality, so you'll need to use them wisely to complete the level.

Prepare the Scenario

In Creation Mode, you'll use your inventory to place objects. While in this mode, the scenario will maintain static. You'll have a wide variety of objects at your disposal: Boxes, bombs, trampolines, levers, and many more. Use them wisely, as you'll only have a limited amount per level.

Test if it Works

Once you're finished, press the play button, and the scenario will come to life. It's time for Clampy to attempt to reach the goal! If they fail, don't worry—you can always make adjustments to the objects and try again.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 or 11
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
